result.execSummary:
Shawn A Anderson was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Shawn A Anderson was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn A Anderson

defendant.name: Anderson, Shawn A
defendant.address: 517 Court St, Clark County Jail, Neillsville, WI 54456

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Original Bond returned by Sherrif's Department unsigned / not posted.

Prosecutor Lyndsey A.B. Brunette and Defendant, Shawn A Anderson appeared, pro se  Defendant advised of right to an attorney  Defendant finalized  waiver of  right to an attorney after full colloquy  Defendant acknowledged receipt of complaint.  Defendant waives extradition hearing and will voluntarily be extradited.
Extradition hearing on February 12, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Richard Lewis appeared for the State; Defendant appeared in person, pro se,  via video conference from Clark County Jail-extradition on hold due to felony charges in Clark County -waiving will not allow him to return to Indiana at this time.  Extradition hearing scheduled for February 12, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Extradition hearing on January 26, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

District Attorney Lyndsey A Boon Brunette appeared on behalf of the State;  Defendant appeared in person, pro se,  via video conference from Clark County Jail  Defendant advised of right to an attorney.  Extradition hearing scheduled for January 26, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
